content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Since we did not agree on a final price, I cannot provide you with an exact number.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: As we did not reach a final agreement, I did not have the opportunity to rate the likeability of the negotiation partner. However, during the conversation, I found Peter Schmidt to be professional and straightforward.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: Since I did not feel discriminated or offended, I cannot provide you with a reason why I would feel that way.
name: Haoyu Wang
